3: We've been notified that a member from another squad will come to borrow our equipment for their maintenance today.
Who will that be?
...I have a hunch.
Same here.

2: We keep running into each other, don't we?

3: AHOY! How are you—
Loud as always.
Why do you look like you know I'm coming?
Good morning, Commandant! Hehehe.
Then you must've been notified that I'm here for your Maintenance Chamber to get my frame fixed up!

Hahaha! There were so many squads sent out last time that everyone needs to get their frame maintained, but there aren't enough Maintenance Chambers in the lab, and I really don't want to stand in line forever!
So I asked Capt if I could visit your place, which comes with its own Maintenance Chamber!

2: Why don't you just ask for a transfer?

3: Whoa! You're just going to poach me right here?
Honestly, you've been staying with us way too much recently.
Feels like you've always been one of us.
It does feel more lively since you're here, Kamui.
I'm a scout. It's only normal that I'll be around other squads a lot!
But it does feel like Commandant and I cross path a lot, doesn't it? I'm always doing scouting missions for Gray Raven!
Do you think we're bounded by destiny or something?
Yeah! Maybe you and I had a thing in our past lives!
You know me sooo well, Commandant.
